# Safe approach - let variable_choices auto-detect
app <- teal::init(
  data = teal_data(IRIS = iris),
  modules = teal::modules(
    teal.modules.general::tm_g_scatterplot(
      label = "Scatter Plot",
      dataname = "IRIS",
      x = teal.transform::data_extract_spec(
        dataname = "IRIS",
        select = teal.transform::select_spec(
          choices = teal.transform::variable_choices("IRIS"), # Auto-detect all columns
          selected = NULL # Let user choose
        )
      ),
      y = teal.transform::data_extract_spec(
        dataname = "IRIS",
        select = teal.transform::select_spec(
          choices = teal.transform::variable_choices("IRIS", c("Petal.Length", "Petal.Width")),
          selected = "Petal.Length"
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
